title: Anyone got a 1920x1080 version of the jhin teasers?
body: cant find any would appreciate a source.

replies.body: Considering they probably don't exist in anywhere but riot studios (and even then i doubt that as none of the teasers i saw were that big) you're not going to have much luck asking here.

you could always just redo it. 

But they look fine in the veiwer as it is, just use a program to redo it to 1920/1080 if you really need it.

Most video editing software can redo it to a different resolution
